EmailTemplate.name: Collegiate Rambler
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
At this time our collegiate selection is limited. However, YETI Custom Shop, our official customization service for Rambler products, will bring your school spirit to life with a wider catalog of schools across the full Rambler family.
See if your school is available at yeticustomshop.com or get in touch by emailing them hi@yeticustomshop.com or calling 512.777.1078
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
